T02D3386:54b-1: shr'i ma h'a k'a la s'a dha nam /
T02D3386:54b-3: dpal mgon po nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D3386:54b-4: dpal mgon po nag po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3386:54b-5: de kho na bzhin du sngon du bstan pa'i chogs stong pa nyid bsgoms la /
T02D3386:54b-6: de'i rjes su sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la h'um nag po'o //
T02D3386:55a-0: @55a * // de nyid yongs su gyur pa'i dpal mgon po nag
T02D3386:55a-1: po rje btsun zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa mdog nag
T02D3386:55a-2: po spyan gsum pa 'bar zhing che ba'i gri gug
T02D3386:55a-3: dang thod pa g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i phyag na
T02D3386:55a-4: bsnams pa / mgo'i phreng bas brgyan pa /
T02D3386:55a-5: skra kham pa gyen du 'greng ba /
T02D3386:55a-6: yan lag la do shal can mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs par byed pa /
T02D3386:55a-7: sbrul gyis yan lag thams cad brgyan pa /
T02D3386:55a-9: kha nas khrag 'dzag pa'i bdag nyid du skad cig gis rdzogs par byas la /
T02D3386:55a-11: de la sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02D3386:55a-12: aom ma h'a k'a la h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3386:55a-15: yungs kar gyis nag po chen po la bdug spos byin la /
T02D3386:55a-17: 'bras bsres pa'i zan dang chang dang /
T02D3386:55a-22: bdud rtsi nag po chen po la gtor ma sngags 'dis sbyin par bya'o //
T02D3386:55a-24: aom ma h'a k'a l'a y'a /
T02D3386:55a-25: sh'a sa na au pa h'a ri ni /
T02D3386:55a-26: ae sha aa pashtsi ma k'a lo /
T02D3386:55a-27: aa yam ai dam ratna tr'a ya /
T02D3386:55a-29: ya di bra t'i dzny'a sma ra si ta d'a /
T02D3386:55a-30: ai dam dushtam kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02D3386:55a-37: de ni me ke na m'a ra ya /
T02D3386:55a-39: de la 'di'i nye bar spyod pa ni tsha ba gsum gyis bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan byas la /
T02D3386:55a-40: lus la tsher mas bkang la dgu dang /
T02D3386:55a-41: ske tshes cho ga bzhin du byugs la /
T02D3386:55a-43: gang gi ming nas gzung ba de de'i dus de nyid du mi snang zhing nyams par 'gyur ro //
T02D3386:55a-45: gang yang rtag tu slob dpon dang /
T02D3386:55a-46: dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa dang /
T02D3386:55a-47: sems can mang la 'tshe byed pa //
T02D3386:55a-48: nag po chen pos za bar 'gyur //
T02D3386:55a-49: de yi yan lag sha bcad cing //
T02D3386:55a-51: de bzhin mgo steng gnas nas ni //
T02D3386:55a-52: til 'bru'i tshad tsam gcod par byed //
T02D3386:55a-53: ces bya ba la sogs pa rtogs par bya'o //
T02D3386:55a-54: dpal mgon po nag po'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3386:55a-55: bram ze mchog sred kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so //
T02D3386:55a-56: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang /
